revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Valor |image = [[File:Lake Valor.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Valor. |tokens = 69,500 |location = North of Route 213. }} '''Lake Valor''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,015,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || rowspan=2|[[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || rowspan=2| [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow, [[File:Murkrow.png|40px]] Murkrow |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen || rowspan=2|[[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || rowspan=2|[[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Staravia.png|40px]] Staravia || rowspan=2|[[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || rowspan=2| [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk, [[File:Houndour.png|40px]] Houndour, [[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky, [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Bibarel.png|40px]] Bibarel |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Azelf.png|40px]] '''Azelf*''' || <center>10,060,000 || [[File:Commander_(saturn).png|40px]] Commander Saturn || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat, [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor, [[File:Toxicroak.png|40px]] Toxicroak || <center>1,533,334 |} '''*Must have cleared Distortion World at least once to unlock Azelf.'''
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 2 || 50.49% || 48.88% || 42.13% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 25.24% || 24.44% || 21.06% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 20.21% || 21.38% || 26.28% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |- | {{Bag2|Lureball}} || N/A || 2.03% || 2.65% || 5.27% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with weight < 2.
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 2 || 50.05% || 50.05% || 50.05% |- | {{Bag2|Sitrus}} || N/A || 25.03% || 25.03% || 25.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 24.02% || 24.02% || 24.02% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Lureball}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |}
